Management presented the 2025 budget proposal of ZMW 12.5 billion. Board deliberated extensively on capital allocation priorities. All committee reports received and noted.

resolutions.description: Board approved the 2025 Annual Budget of ZMW 12.5 billion, subject to ratification by the Ministry of Energy and confirmation of government subsidy levels.

CEO briefed the board on the operational situation and immediate response measures required. Board approved emergency procurement of temporary diesel generation capacity and authorised the CEO to engage the Ministry of Energy directly.

resolutions.title: Public Stakeholder Communication on Load Shedding

resolutions.description: Board resolved to approve the Q4 2024 financial statements as presented by the CFO, subject to finalisation of external audit opinion by KPMG Zambia.

resolutions.title: Approval of FY2025 Operational Budget
resolutions.description: Board approved the FY2025 operational budget of ZMW 2,950,000,000, including ZMW 650,000,000 for gold refinery expansion capital expenditure and ZMW 480,000,000 for artisanal mining formalisation activities.

resolutions.title: Appointment of KPMG Zambia as External Auditors for FY2024
resolutions.description: Board resolved to appoint KPMG Zambia as external auditors for the FY2024 financial year audit engagement, with the audit fee of ZMW 4,200,000 authorised.

title: Board Meeting Q3 2024
location: Zambia Gold House, Alick Nkhata Road, Lusaka
agenda: Review Q2 2024 financial performance, artisanal mining formalisation update, gold refinery Phase 1 completion report, dividend policy discussion
minutes: Meeting called to order at 09:00 by Chairperson Dr. Emmanuel Mutati. Quorum confirmed with 6 out of 7 members present. CFO presented Q2 2024 financials showing revenue of ZMW 695,000,000. Board noted satisfactory progress on gold buying centres. Artisanal mining formalisation programme has registered 1,240 miners to date.

resolutions.title: Approval of Interim Dividend for FY2024
resolutions.description: Board resolved to declare an interim dividend of ZMW 80,000,000 for FY2024, payable to the Government of Zambia by 30 November 2024.

resolutions.title: Approval of Gold Refinery Phase 2 Feasibility Study
resolutions.description: Board approved commissioning of a feasibility study for the gold refinery Phase 2 expansion to increase refining capacity from 2 to 5 tonnes per month, at an estimated cost of ZMW 28,000,000 for the study.

title: Annual General Meeting 2024
location: Radisson Blu Hotel, Lusaka
agenda: Adoption of FY2023 annual report and financial statements, election of board members, approval of external auditors, shareholder questions
minutes: AGM convened at 10:00. The FY2023 Annual Report and audited financial statements were tabled and adopted. Board membership was confirmed with no changes. Shareholders expressed satisfaction with operational progress and requested enhanced reporting on artisanal mining formalisation.

resolutions.title: Adoption of FY2023 Annual Report and Financial Statements
resolutions.description: Shareholders resolved to adopt the FY2023 Annual Report and audited financial statements showing net profit of ZMW 270,000,000 and total assets of ZMW 5,100,000,000.

resolutions.title: Approval of FY2023 Final Dividend
resolutions.description: Shareholders approved a final dividend of ZMW 120,000,000 for FY2023, payable to the Government of Zambia by 31 July 2024.
